Here is an example of sprig functions in action.  For the complete
documentation, go to:  http://masterminds.github.io/sprig

String:
* {{ trim "   hello    " }}
* {{ trimAll "$" "$5.00" }}
* {{ trimSuffix "-" "hello-" }}
* {{ substr 0 5 "hello world" }}
* {{ trunc 5 "hello world" }}
* {{ contains "cat" "catch" }}

Type Conversion:
* {{ list 1 2 3 | toStrings }}

Default functions:
* {{ default "foo" .Action }}
* {{ empty .Foo }}
* {{ true | ternary "foo" "bar" }}


Crypto:
* {{ sha1sum "Hello world!" }}
